name: NRCellDU
description: NR Cell Distributed Unit (DU) resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nCGI
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Uniquely identifies a NR cell within a PLMN (3GPP 38.300)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: operationalState
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Operational state describes whether physically installed and working or not (ITU-T X.731)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: administrativeState
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Indicates the administrative state of the object instance (ITU-T X.731)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: availabilityStatus
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Indicates the availability status of the object instance (ITU-T X.731)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: pLMNIdList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of PLMN-Id: Mobile Country Codes (MCC) or Mobile Network Codes(MNC) (3GPP 23.003)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nSSAIList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Network Slice Selection Assistance Information

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nRpci
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Physical Cell Identity (PCI) of NR cell (3GPP 36.211)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nRTac
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Identity of the common Tracking Area Code (TAC) for the PLMNs.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: bSChannelBw
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: BS Channel bandwidth in MHz (3GPP 38.104)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fDDCarrierDL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Frequency Division Duplex (FDD) carrier downlink (DL)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fDDCarrierUL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Frequency Division Duplex (FDD) carrier uplink (UL)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: cyclicPrefixDL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Cyclic prefix for downlink (3GPP 38.211)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: cyclicPrefixUL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Cyclic prefix for uplink (3GPP 38.211)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fDDBwpCommonCarrierFreqDL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: FDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) common carrier frequency of downlink (DL)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fDDBwpCommonCarrierFreqUL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: FDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) common carrier frequency of uplink (UL)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fDDBwpCommonChannelBwDL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: FDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) common channel bandwidth of downlink (DL)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fDDBwpCommonChannelBwUL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: FDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) common channel bandwidth of uplink (UL)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: tDDBwpCommonCarrierFreq
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: TDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) common carrier frequency

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: tDDBwpCommonChannelBw
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: FDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) common channel bandwidth

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fDDBwpDedicatedCarrierFreqDL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: FDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) dedicated carrier frequency of downlink (DL)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fDDBwpDedicatedCarrierFreqUL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: FDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) dedicated carrier frequency of uplink (UL)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fDDBwpDedicatedChannelBwDL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: FDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) dedicated channel bandwidth of downlink (DL)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fDDBwpDedicatedChannelBwUL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: FDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) dedicated channel bandwidth of uplink (UL)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: tDDBwpDedicatedCarrierFreq
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: TDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) dedicated carrier frequency

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: tDDBwpDedicatedChannelBw
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: TDD Bandwidth Part (BWP) dedicated channel bandwidth

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: rRMPolicy
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Radio Resources Management (RRM) policy

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: VsDataContainer
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Container for vendor specific data

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nRSectorCarrier
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Represents the resources of each transmission point included in the cell

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: EnergySavingProperties
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Energy saving properties of a network element supporting Energy Saving Management

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: ESPolicies
